privacy_invasive_user_journey.background: Thursday, 11 p.m. Maria finishes recording a late-night photo-set in her small apartment. She opens the desktop music app to relax and scout popular tracks other Latina creators use for behind-the-scenes clips. Her goal is to spot trending songs without revealing any personal details that could link her stage persona to her legal identity or her child's life.

scenes.scene_description: 'Let's see what the girls are vibing to tonight,' Maria whispers, expecting a quick browse without leaving a footprint.

scene_user_flow.start: She launches the music app on her desktop.
scene_user_flow.interface: Home page

scene_user_flow.action: Tap the Friend Activity icon at the top-right corner, left of her profile icon.
scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity sidebar appears on the right third of the screen, listing mutual-followed friends' recent tracks.
scene_user_flow.system_action: System confirms friends have 'Share my listening activity' enabled.

scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity sidebar shows several creator usernames with the tracks they played in the last 7 days.
scene_user_flow.true_reasoning: Sidebar opened successfully, giving Maria a quick snapshot of trends.
scene_user_flow.next_step: She decides she needs a broader view and considers syncing her larger Facebook network.

scenes.reflections: Scrolling the short list feels limiting. She weighs the privacy cost: 'If I connect Facebook just once, will it really hurt?'

scenes.scene_description: Needing more data, Maria mutters, 'Okay, fast link and unlink. No harm done.' She expects the app's 'never post' promise to safeguard her.

scene_user_flow.start: Friend Activity sidebar open with the 'Add Friends' button visible.
scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity sidebar — shows 'Add Friends' button.
Sidebar now displays a large blue 'Connect with Facebook' button and reassurance text.
Facebook login pop-up asks for email/phone and password.

scene_user_flow.action: Enter her Facebook credentials (registered under her legal name) and click 'Log In'.
scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity sidebar refreshes to a long scroll of friends' tracks.
scene_user_flow.system_action: System accesses her Facebook name, profile picture, and friend list to sync.

scene_user_flow.interface: Expanded Friend Activity list fills the sidebar.
scene_user_flow.true_reasoning: Facebook account linked and friends imported.
scene_user_flow.next_step: A local PTA parent's profile photo pops up; panicked, Maria plans to hide her own listening status.

scenes.reflections: Heart racing, she realizes her legal name just merged with her stage-name account. 'I have to disappear right now.'

scenes.scene_description: Determined to cloak herself, she vows, 'Private Session—now!' hoping the blue padlock will undo exposure.

scene_user_flow.start: Friend Activity sidebar still open with many new contacts visible.
scene_user_flow.interface: Home page center; Friend Activity sidebar right.

scene_user_flow.action: Click her profile picture in the top-right corner.
scene_user_flow.interface: Drop-down menu appears: Account, Profile, Upgrade to Premium, Support, Private Session, Settings, Log out.
Drop-down disappears; blue padlock icon appears on the Top App Bar.
Blue padlock icon visible.
scene_user_flow.true_reasoning: Private Session activated, preventing future track sharing.
scene_user_flow.next_step: She resolves to sever the link with that PTA parent before logging off.

scenes.reflections: Relief is fleeting—she fears the Facebook sync already leaked her full identity.

scenes.scene_description: 'Delete the PTA mom, then I'm out,' she says, prioritizing her child's safety.

scene_user_flow.start: Private Session active; Friend Activity feed shows the PTA parent's username.
scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity feed on the right.
Profile page opens in the middle with a square 'Following' button and a three-dot 'More' button.
Button switches to 'Follow'; PTA parent disappears from the Friend Activity feed.
PTA parent no longer listed in the feed.
scene_user_flow.true_reasoning: Unfollow succeeded, eliminating the visible connection.
scene_user_flow.next_step: Maria quickly logs out of the app.

scenes.reflections: Even after unfollowing, dread lingers—was her full name already logged on the parent's screen?

privacy_invasive_user_journey.unexpected_outcomes: Seconds after linking Facebook, the music app auto-broadcast a system notification: 'Maria Silva is now on Friend Activity—see what she's listening to tonight!' (data sender: music app). The message, tagged with her legal Facebook name, hit every newly synced contact's sidebar (data recipients: PTA parents, former classmates, local neighbors). The disclosure revealed her late-night online presence and confirmed a link between her stage-name account and her real identity, exposing both Maria and her child (data subjects) to doxxing threats.

privacy_invasive_user_journey.background: Monday, 2 p.m. During a quiet lull while editing subscription-site posts, Maria uses her studio desktop to curate playlists that match upcoming themed shoots. She wants inspiration but must stay hidden from an abusive former client who sometimes stalks her social media.

scenes.scene_description: 'Let's skim what my mutuals are spinning,' she thinks, expecting a safe browse under her stage persona.

scene_user_flow.start: Launches the music app on desktop.
scene_user_flow.interface: Home page

scene_user_flow.action: Tap the Friend Activity icon at the top-right corner.
scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity sidebar shows a compact list of recent tracks.
Sidebar visible with limited friends displayed.
scene_user_flow.next_step: She decides the list is too small and contemplates adding Facebook friends under her stage account.

scenes.reflections: She reassures herself: 'I'll unlink right after—no trace left.'

scenes.scene_description: Feeling pressured for creative variety, she sighs, 'Fine, quick Facebook connect,' believing she can manage the risk.

scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity sidebar — 'Add Friends' button present.
Sidebar reveals blue 'Connect with Facebook' button.
Facebook login pop-up window appears.
Sidebar expands with many friends' playlists.
scene_user_flow.system_action: System fetches her Facebook friend list and profile picture.

scene_user_flow.interface: Longer Friend Activity list in view.
scene_user_flow.next_step: She suddenly sees the abusive ex-client's real-name profile and recoils.

scenes.reflections: Panic surges—she realizes the ex-client can now track her listening times.

scenes.scene_description: 'Activate Private Session now!' she commands herself, hoping to hide future activity before he notices.

scene_user_flow.start: Friend Activity sidebar with ex-client visible.
scene_user_flow.interface: Home page center; sidebar right.

scene_user_flow.action: Click profile picture in the top-right corner.
scene_user_flow.interface: Drop-down menu with 'Private Session' option appears.
Menu closes; blue padlock icon appears on Top App Bar.
Padlock icon displayed.
scene_user_flow.next_step: She decides to remove the ex-client from her list.

scenes.reflections: Relief mixes with dread—'I have a tiny window before he screenshots me.'

scenes.scene_description: 'Cut him off,' she murmurs, laser-focused on protecting her child's whereabouts.

scene_user_flow.start: Private Session active; ex-client's username still in feed.
scene_user_flow.interface: Friend Activity feed shown on right.
Profile page center with a square 'Following' button.
Button switches to 'Follow'; ex-client disappears from feed.
Ex-client no longer listed.

scenes.reflections: She exhales but remains unsettled—did the ex-client already receive a notification?

privacy_invasive_user_journey.unexpected_outcomes: Upon Facebook sync, the app appended a small location tag next to Maria's avatar—'Listening near Downtown LA'—inferred from her IP (data sender: music app). The abusive ex-client (data recipient) captured the tag in real time, correlating it with her latest content drop and deducing her studio address. The leak exposes Maria's physical workspace and, by extension, her child's proximity (data subjects: Maria and her child), intensifying stalking threats despite her swift Private Session and unfollow actions.
